menu.name: Margherita Pizza
menu.description: Fresh mozzarella, basil, and tomato sauce on a crispy crust.

menu.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
menu.description: Tender spaghetti with rich meat sauce and a sprinkle of Parmesan cheese.

menu.name: Lasagna
menu.description: Layers of pasta, meat sauce, and melted mozzarella cheese.

menu.name: Chicken Parmesan
menu.description: Breaded and fried chicken topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese.

menu.name: Caprese Salad
menu.description: Fresh mozzarella, tomato, and basil drizzled with olive oil and balsamic glaze.

menu.name: Bruschetta
menu.description: Toasted bread topped with diced tomatoes, garlic, and basil.

menu.name: Cannoli
menu.description: Crispy pastry shells filled with sweet ricotta cheese and chocolate chips.

menu.name: Tiramisu
menu.description: Coffee-soaked ladyfingers layered with mascarpone cheese and cocoa powder.
